text:
The SimpleLinkRewritingTransformer removes request parameters from the URL
(everything including and after the ? is stripped from the URL).
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: Added lenya-dev@cocoon.apache.org to CC-list of this bug.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
andreas@apache.org
text: Yes. Has to be tested again I guess.

i just tested it again (with LinkRewritingTransformer) and it is indeed still a
problem.
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
there is a workaround: add a # to your link like this
/default/authoring/index.html#?bla

the link rewriting transformer preserves everything after the #

punting to 1.4, where we should look at using the cocoon link rewriter maybe.
creator: gregor@apache.org
